Song.title: What Mystery
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Devon Kauflin © 2008 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Bm | G | D | Em (2x)]
Verse 1: Here [Bm]I am, [G]praising Your great na[D]me I’ll [Em]never be the s[Bm]ame [G]because of You [D Em] Holy [Bm]God, [G]right in all Your wa[D]ys The [Em]blameless took on b[Bm]lame [G] What mystery [D Em]
Chorus 1: [G] [ ]Oh what m[D]ercy, You have [Bm] [ ]pardoned m[A]e [G] [ ]Oh what l[D]ove, You have [Bm] [ ]set me fr[A]ee [G] [ ]Oh what g[D]race, You are [Bm] [ ]changing m[A]e [G] [ ]Now I m[D]arvel at this [Bm] [ ]mystery [A] [(First time, to intro)] [(Second time) A Bm D D/F# A D]
Verse 2: Just one [Bm] sin [G]left me on my [D]own De[Em]serving wrath unkn[Bm]own, [G] [ ]but still I li[D Em]ve On the [Bm] cross, [G]cursed You were for [D]me Be[Em]came God’s ene[Bm G]my What mystery[D Em]
Chorus 2: [G] [ ]Oh what m[D]ercy, You have [D/F#] [ ]pardoned m[A]e [Bm] [ ]Oh what l[D]ove, You have [D/F#] [ ]set me fr[A]ee [G] [ ]Oh what g[D]race, You are [Bm] [ ]changing m[A]e [G] [ ]Now I m[D]arvel at this [Bm] [ ]mystery [A (to chorus 1)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 here i am praising your great name ill never be the same because of you holy god right in all your ways the blameless took on blame what mystery chorus 1 oh what mercy you have pardoned me oh what love you have set me free oh what grace you are changing me now i marvel at this mystery verse 2 just one sin left me on my own deserving wrath unknown but still i live on the cross cursed you were for me became gods enemy what mystery chorus 2 oh what mercy you have pardoned me oh what love you have set me free oh what grace you are changing me now i marvel at this mystery
